channel.title: Kaggle on Ismail Can Oguz

item.title: What I learned from NeurIPS Open Polymer Prediction (Kaggle)
item.description:
Our team ranked 219 / 2240 (bronze). Notes:

  • Start simple baselines early; add ensembling later.
  • Careful CV splits matter as much as model choice.
  • Good feature hygiene and ablations beat one-off leaderboard jumps.
